verses.text: \w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* \w yourself|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*! \w Put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* garments \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w splendor|strong="H8597"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* enter \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Shake|strong="H5287"\w* \w off|strong="H6605"\w* \w your|strong="H6605"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*! \w Rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H6605"\w* throne, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. \w Remove|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w chains|strong="H4147"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w your|strong="H6605"\w* \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w captive|strong="H7628"\w* \w Daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3068"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w*.”

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w At|strong="H5971"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w live|strong="H1481"\w*, \w then|strong="H3588"\w* Assyria \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w* \w without|strong="H3588"\w* \w cause|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*? \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w without|strong="H2600"\w* \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*; \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* taunt, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="H5006"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w My|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w My|strong="H3045"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w*. \w Here|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w*!”

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H2896"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H2896"\w* \w bring|strong="H1319"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w news|strong="H1319"\w*, \w who|strong="H2896"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H8085"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w who|strong="H2896"\w* \w bring|strong="H1319"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w*, \w who|strong="H2896"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H8085"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \w who|strong="H2896"\w* say \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, “\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* God \w reigns|strong="H4427"\w*!”

\w Listen|strong="H6963"\w*! \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w watchmen|strong="H6822"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w voices|strong="H6963"\w*, \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shout|strong="H7442"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w every|strong="H7725"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w returns|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w Break|strong="H6476"\w* \w forth|strong="H6476"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*, \w sing|strong="H7442"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w ruins|strong="H2723"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w bared|strong="H2834"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*; \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ends \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Depart|strong="H5493"\w*, \w depart|strong="H5493"\w*, \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*! \w Touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w no|strong="H5375"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w thing|strong="H3627"\w*; \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w*, \w purify|strong="H1305"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H8033"\w*, \w you|strong="H8432"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w leave|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hurry \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w flee|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w haste|strong="H2649"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w goes|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* rear guard.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w My|strong="H5375"\w* \w Servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w prosper|strong="H7919"\w*; \w He|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* \w raised|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w highly|strong="H3966"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*.

Just \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w appalled|strong="H8074"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*—\w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w disfigured|strong="H4893"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* any \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w form|strong="H8389"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w marred|strong="H4893"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5921"\w* human likeness—

\w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*. \w Kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w shut|strong="H7092"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w understand|strong="H8085"\w* \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.
